article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay post-230798 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-athletics category-general category-high-school-news category-parents category-school-board

div.p: Please join us for the 2020 Athletic Banquet tonight! The video will premier at 6:30 pm TONIGHT! Please share the link with those who'd like to watch! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H7_Pg3vw1Ow

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay post-229308 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-elementary-news category-general category-high-school-news category-parents

div.p: April 20th, 2020Dear EPS Families,Ellendale Public Schools will remain closed to students due to COVID-19 until further notice. Distance learning plans are in place to allow students to continue their education while school-buildings are closed. Below are several...

et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2 blurb-ripple-out et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_blurb_position_top

span.a: Links, information, and resources for EPS faculty & staff.

div.p: OUR PROMISE: EVERY STUDENT in Ellendale Public School will be SUPPORTED to learn and grow while being VALUED for their STRENGTHS, NEEDS, and SKILLS. We promise our graduates will be CHALLENGED enabling them to be capable of SUCCEEDING as productive CITIZENS.
